basics.name: Ismail Bohra
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Dedicated MERN Stack Developer with a passion for creating efficient and user-friendly web applications. Seeking a full-stack developer position to leverage my skills and experience in building innovative software solutions.

work.name: OEPP Innovation Pvt Ltd
work.summary: Implemented ClickSend integration for messaging, Knex, and Sequelize for efficient database operations. Successfully migrated old data from Excel to SQL and mapped them for improved data management. Contributed to a project by implementing search and orderby logic for data retrieval and management.

work.name: Institute of Engineering & Science, IPS ACADEMY
work.summary: Expanded campus management system that tracks academic events and reduced paperwork by 90%. Leading development of the Institute's Autonomous System, which serves approximately 10,000 students and over 500 faculties. Updated 60% of previously built system according to Institute's Autonomous Rules.

education.institution: Institute of Engineering & Science, IPS ACADEMY

projects.name: Inventory Management System
projects.description: Developed an Inventory Management System using the MERN stack. Implemented features for tracking inventory, managing orders, and generating reports.
highlights: Led the development of an Inventory Management app for a company, facilitating purchase order and package tracking.
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js for seamless integration of front-end and back-end.
Implemented MongoDB for efficient storage and retrieval of inventory data.

projects.name: Order Tracking Application
projects.description: Contributed to the development of an Order Tracking Application, enabling real-time tracking and status updates for clients' orders.
highlights: Developed a B2B-focused Order Tracking Application using the MERN stack, catering to the specific needs of businesses and their clients.
Implemented a secure and scalable authentication system, allowing businesses to manage multiple user roles and permissions within their organizations.
